titleStmt.title: Keepe within compasse: or, the worthy legacy of a wise father to his beloued sonne teaching him how to liue richly in this world and eternally happy in the world to come. Meete for all sorts of people whatsoeuer.
titleStmt.author: Trundle, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: for I. Trundle dwelling in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: Initialed John T.; possibly by John Trundle.
Printed by G. Eld in 1619. Cf. STC.
Item at reel 891:16 identified as STC 14899.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
